website_summaries.verdict: Reliable formula that reduces the amount of shedding the dog does over time.
pros: This conditioner moisturizes the dog's skin with cocoa butter, which reduces the amount of shedding
Conditioner has no soap in the formula, so it won't dry out skin
Includes fatty acids that encourage healthy skin and coat
cons: Some quality-control issues with the seals on the bottles

customer_reviews.title: Best! Conditioner! Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best! Conditioner! Ever! Do you love your dogs? Just get this. I love this line. Everything from Tropiclean is pure gold, but this! Smells like heaven. If you remember Bath and Body Works’ coconut lime verbena, it smells just like this. Got two Great Danes, short haired breed and it makes their coat baby soft. They smell so good, I can’t stop burying my nose on them. And they don’t seem to complain!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Dowson

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Totally recommend to use alongside the same deshedding shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: Both Shampoo and Conditioner arrived wrapped in plastic. No leaks. I am super happy about that! Product-wise, I LOVE IT!!! It leaves my dog's hair SOOOOOOOOOOO SOFT!! I left a review on the Shampoo and it has seriously helped with my dog's shedding. I gave him a bath on Sunday and I have yet to vacuum my home (I used to have to do it everyday, twice a day -- during the cold months then once a day). I am amazed and pleasantly surprised by both the shampoo and the conditioner. I will continue to use together. I HIGHLY recommend these products if you have a dog that sheds a lot --> Golden Retriever mom.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia13

customer_reviews.title: Tropiclean Products Been Using For Years - Excellent Choice!
customer_reviews.text: Love Tropiclean products, I've been using their shampoo & conditioners the de-shedding formulas for years. I love that they contain natural ingredients and they are tearless, even though I use J & J Head & Shoulders formula when washing fur faces. I love, how soft it makes my dogs coats feel and how cuts it down on shedding. The Lime Cocoa Butter is my favorite scent so far. I also recommend the Oral Care Fresh Breath Water Additive, I'm on my second bottle and I think it's really working to keep the tarter down.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS AN AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Shampoo and Conditioner because my dog was shedding. I thought this product might help. Little did I know but this stuff is amazing. Not only has it helped with shedding, the shampoo conditioner leave my dogs fur extremely soft. After the first use I could barely stop touching my dog because his fur was sooo soft. It smells good also. I am very impressed with this product. So I have given 5 stars. I would recommend this product even if your pet isn’t shedding. The silky smooth softness of my dogs fur is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 10 yrs. My dogs smell like key lime pie after their baths. I just recently switched from hypo allergenic to deshedding in both shampoo and conditioner. It is a very gentle shampoo for my sensitive dogs. I haven’t noticed less hair. But the smell is great, their fur is shiny and soft. I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: james adam

customer_reviews.title: My dog is softer then yours.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I can not stop petting my dog and I washed him over a week ago. It arrived on time and was surprisingly large for what I expected. My dog also has very sensitive skin and this didn’t effect him at all. I also purchased the shampoo by the same company but the “medicated anti itch” and that was great as well. Both products smelled great and spread easily through his fur. (Long hair German Shepard) Happy customer. Will by again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: The products smells good. It feels creamy when worked into my shorkie hair. I can't say the hair is softer and would about the same if not used. I mainly use for the scent. Must leave on for several minutes to allow for the smell to absorb onto dogs fur. The smell may last for 3 days when used on my fur babies. Also I am currently keeping hair short so I can't comment on helping with detangling the hair.
customer_reviews.author: moya

customer_reviews.title: Miracle conditioner
customer_reviews.text: We use this conditioner on our German Shepherd when we bathe him and it's so effective! Leaves his coat soft, smelling amazing, and shining! It also prevents him from overly shedding for like 2 weeks, it's excellent! Truly Desheds like it says it does!
customer_reviews.author: Yanelis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how much it helps with lowering the shedding, but it smells AMAZING. They were using this at some of the local groomers and it was cheaper on amazon, so of course I had to order it. The smell is fantastic and lasts for a few days, has that beach smell. If you are going to use conditioner, I say go for this one!
customer_reviews.author: Harmony22

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, solves dry skin issues
customer_reviews.text: Amazing conditioner. My pup had small amount of dandruff before I started using this. Now all good! Smells amazing - reminds me of vacations to Sanibel Island :)
customer_reviews.author: ali192

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: It makes your pet shed right then and there during bath time. I recommend wash BF outside with a bag handy to throw all of the wet and loose fur clumps into. Out husky and husky mixes were shedding BAD. Like a brushing twice a day and the same amount of fur would come out while they looked like they had lost nothing. This worked wonders! Bathed, brushed, towel dried and they stopped shedding for over a week. It definitely helped loosen the fur.
customer_reviews.author: Pet Owner, Truck Lover, Nail Art & DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Great Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: We have a Cavalier King Charles Spaniel. Sort of coarse hair. The conditioner was easy to apply and massage in to her fur. Rinsed her off and air dried. Lovely smell...like a little coconut. Softened her coat nicely. She's ready to snuggle up on your lap and smelling so good made it a treat. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my 3 labs.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite conditioner for dogs! I have 3 labs, one with very sensitive skin, and this always helps with shedding and makes their cost very soft. The smell is amazing and it is quite a bit less in cost on amazon than in store.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by our groomer and it is awesome! When I finished bathing Charlie he was as soft as when he has been to the groomer and he smelled amazing! I HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but lost a lot to leakage
customer_reviews.text: I love Tropiclean shampoos and conditioners. But, like others, this bottle arrived leaking badly. Normally, I would blame the shipper (Amazon), but with so many similar complaints, I think the manufacturer needs to improve the seal on their containers.
customer_reviews.author: MadHatter

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Smells great. Wish I could use it more to see the shed control benefits. Only downside to using it, and the reason I don’t use it as often as I’d like, is that my other cat has to re-learn his scent every time we use it. She deems him as an imposter, and they fight for two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler & BreAnn Cook

customer_reviews.title: Does not moisturize AT ALL!!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! It does NOT moisturize or make the fur have ANY shine at all...SO DISAPPOINTED by the nice reviews! I'm returning it. Will buy FURminator dog shampoo and conditioner instead!
customer_reviews.author: g3heavenlyfruit

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience. Maybe it will work out for someone elses fur babies
customer_reviews.text: This was basically a bad purchase and waisted money. This stuff made my fur baby skin flakey, itchy and his hair sheds out terribly. I will be extremely careful from now on out on what I put on him.
customer_reviews.author: Uniquely Awkward

customer_reviews.title: Too thin & wasteful
customer_reviews.text: It was really thin so you ended up using more than you intended. The smell is good & it was soft just too thin. Needs to be a bit thicker so it lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mistydawn & Brandan

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shampoo and conditioner from a local pet store a year ago and loved it. Unfortunately, the conditioner was not an item that any local retailers had when I needed to purchase again. Thank goodness amazon has everything. I love the smell and the conditioner makes my yorkie so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom and her new rescue pup. He now smells A-M-A-Z-I-N-G! The scent lasts for days on end and helps make it much easier to brush him. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: C.m. Hanssen

customer_reviews.title: Great conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner smells amazing and leaves hair very silky and shinny. It really helps with odor control. In combination with the shampoo I havr noticed less shedding in my jack russell terrier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells great
customer_reviews.text: We have used a lot of different shampoos and conditioners on our Great Dane. However this product not only truly helped with shedding, our Dane is worst after a bath, but it also smells great. This product definitely works well, smells great and does what it claims. Worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Scent
customer_reviews.text: Works great to help with shedding on our Cavalier king Charles and smells good
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: will buy again
customer_reviews.text: made my dogs smell like a day at the beach also helped lossen hair!
customer_reviews.author: Heather E.

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again !
customer_reviews.text: I have a Rottweiler and I love the way it leaves his fur and the scent is prefect !
customer_reviews.author: M H J

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. As far as deshedding goes, she still sheds pretty bad but I guess without it, it could b worse
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Haven't use it yet, will bath my cat this weekend
customer_reviews.author: Yuly Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great coat and smell after!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo and condition brand as soon as I got my puppy. It’s been doing a great job and she barely sheds and her coat is soooo soft after and smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: Great dog conditioner! Leaves my dogs coat super soft, tons of hair comes off when using it so there is less on my dog to shed. Also leaves my dog smelling super nice for days.
customer_reviews.author: Alida Wolff

customer_reviews.title: leaves dog's fur super soft
customer_reviews.text: I use tropiclean products all the time in my grooming shop and the kiwi conditioner is my favorite. I just recently tried it for the first time and now, I'll never be without it. It leaves all types of dog hair super soft, easy to comb out and I love the scent. My clients have all been really impressed with how soft their dogs' coats are since I started using it. Try it for yourself, I think you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: K9klips

customer_reviews.title: Great Conditioner.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell, but my puppy is still mulling things over. I will say on her behalf, however, her coat is silky, shiny, and dander is gone (no more flaking skin). The comb just slides through like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Heymare66

customer_reviews.title: that's it good to use on my dog
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it smells and makes my dog's hair feel so soft
customer_reviews.author: Jewell Galligani

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Have always used Tropiclean facial scrub now a new favorite Tropiclean item to love as well.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Desheds well
customer_reviews.text: Great de-shedder. Comparable in effectiveness with furminator conditioner, just depends on which smell you like better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, but dog itched
customer_reviews.text: This product smelled great but caused my Poodle puppy to itch a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Chy

customer_reviews.title: Same as professional cosmetic, but reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Very good thing! It can be compared to a professional, expensive grooming cosmetic. My groomer used it all the time for my dog preparing him for dog shows and we got our Champion title))))
customer_reviews.author: Inna Tarasiuk

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this conditioner
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing. Combined with the shampoo, it had my husky smelling fresh. Only tip is to make sure it is washed out thoroughly. Also, leads to very soft fur. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Gets that hair out
customer_reviews.text: You can actually see the difference with using the shampoo/conditioner and furminating vs using a different shampoo/conditioner and then furminating
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Emmer

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good
customer_reviews.text: Smells delish and leaves your pooch ultra soft! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Smells great. Leaves fur soft.
customer_reviews.text: It is great. It leaves her fur super soft and smelling fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: John palacio

customer_reviews.title: Greatcstuff
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 dogs that shed a lot, one bath with this product has reduced the shedding a considerable amount
customer_reviews.author: duffer72

customer_reviews.title: A new favorite
customer_reviews.text: The lime cocoa butter shampoo and conditioner is great for our white puddle mix when her hair is long. We use other TropiClean products and this one is now a favorite too.
customer_reviews.author: jordan halsey

customer_reviews.title: Favorite dog conditioner
customer_reviews.text: My dog sheds quit a bit and this definitely helps minimize it
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great conditioner
customer_reviews.text: The scent actually last a few days unlike other conditioners I've tried and I've noticed my dogs hair doesn't she'd as much or feel as dry
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Soft and silky
customer_reviews.text: Recomened by my dog groomer. My dogs hair is so soft and silky its amazing and the scent is great too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful. Really good sized bottle
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful. Really good sized bottle. Made my dogs fur extremely soft. Not sure if it helped with shedding though.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Blakeman

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good, left it on for 5 minutes and was able to brush so much hair out of my Pomsky!
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: broken bottle
customer_reviews.text: works fairly well. but the bottle was broken on receipt, used anyway, but troublesome. the packers wrapped it in plastic, but it only made the mess worse.
customer_reviews.author: michael w.

customer_reviews.title: smells super good
customer_reviews.text: my dog was smelly and is fur was really rough but when i used this he smelled super good and his fur was super soft. i recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good, my dogs feel soft and squeaky clean
customer_reviews.author: linda l.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love all these products for my theee fur babies. Leaves them soft, shinny and smells amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Tropical treat for fur balls
customer_reviews.text: I love how this makes my cat mojo soft,shiny and the smell is awesome. It goes on really smoothly. Great tip a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: My  my

customer_reviews.title: Good for dry skin and fur
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this and it keeps her fur soft and conditioned
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Wow Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This make my Krystal fur shine when I blow dry her fur! and she smell so good I love this and the shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m sure it’s a great product for most dogs but unfortunately mine was allergic
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it’s a great product for most dogs but unfortunately mine was allergic. Only reason for 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: ... and this shampoo worked wonders on making him smell wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: My pug got sprayed by a skunk and this shampoo worked wonders on making him smell wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good! it got rid of tangles that we didnt ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good! it got rid of tangles that we didnt even knew our puppy had. Her hair is so soft now and brushing her is much easier
customer_reviews.author: nicholas dibbleglidden

customer_reviews.title: Great conditioner for labradoodles!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product reduces the amount of shedding for my labradoodle. His comb outs are easier...great product!
customer_reviews.author: PATTY HARRIS-PERKINS

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CONDITIONER......
customer_reviews.text: This is a great conditioner but you have to remember that it's in a concentrated form so be sure to add plenty of water after applying it.This is a great brand, and I have been using it for several years.I have had good results using it.buying it in a big container is economical as well.Just be sure to buy the pump when you order this. They are inexpensive, I picked up two for less than $10 including shipping.I have a sheltie, and it makes his coat look really good.This company also makes SPA brand dog shampoo which is also good.
customer_reviews.author: sothpaw 68

customer_reviews.title: My dog smells so good after using this
customer_reviews.text: My dog smells so good after using this! He's a rat terrier mix with dry skin and this conditioner helps keep his coat shiny and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good and super gentle on my dogs coats
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Looking good and smelling good
customer_reviews.text: Great product and smell for my animals. Have used this product for the last 4 years and always send a bottle home with my pups when they are ready for their new homes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Lewis Jr

customer_reviews.title: The best for skin issues
customer_reviews.text: My dog has extremely inflamed skin and this help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Snider

customer_reviews.title: It will clog your tub with how great it works!
customer_reviews.text: It really helped with my dogs shedding. It leaves his coat soft and smelling amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good smelling products!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Tropiclean products for quite some time, and was happy to see the items available in 1 gallon sizes!
customer_reviews.author: S. Collins

customer_reviews.title: A four to me
customer_reviews.text: It is a conditioner but I tought it was a no rinse conditioner though it did not say that, Probably good but my dog hates a bath and thus wanted a skin conditioner and not a after shampoo conditioner, Than after using you have to rinse well. Oh well. Will use it eventually
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY(online at least)...bottle leaks & you end up w/ a MESS!
customer_reviews.text: NO IDEA how this actually works on my Teddy Bear as the cap/bag was full of conditioner when I received it. Cleaned it up & put it in drawer...opened the door last night, I now have conditioner all over in the drawer as it leaked/spilled AGAIN. DO NOT BUY...you waste more conditioner (& money) than you use on your dog! Dealing w/ the 1st mess was annoying but I figured oh well, just clean it up, but happening TWICE and making a bigger mess, wasting more well, I decided I should let buyers know what mess they are buying when they purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi K

customer_reviews.title: Tropiclean
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I wanted. I have used it for years and 1-800 PetSupplies stopped carrying it in gallon size.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hofmann

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my TropiClean products.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs tend to get dry, itchy skin especially in the winter here in Michigan. I have been using the TropiClean brand shampoo and conditioner for a while now and I have noticed a big difference in the "Soap-Free" oatmeal products with my dogs. The medicated anti-itch really helps and it's all natural! My dogs don't hesitate as much to jump in the tub for their baths anymore. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the best. It is just okay. I don't think it really helped deshed my OES.
customer_reviews.author: onlycme

product_meta.title: TropiClean Lime & Cocoa Butter Conditioner for Pets, 20oz, Made in USA
product_meta.description: TropiClean Lime & Cocoa Butter Shed Control Dog & Cat Conditioner moisturizes and conditions your pet’s skin and coat to reduce shedding, leaving their skin and coat healthy and soft. The refreshing scent of lime and cocoa butter leaves them smelling fresh and ready for cuddles! TropiClean Pet Products are cruelty free.
feature_bullets: REDUCES SHEDDING – TropiClean Lime & Cocoa Butter Shed Control Dog & Cat Conditioner moisturizes and conditions your pet’s skin and coat to reduce shedding, leaving their skin and coat healthy and soft.
REFRESHING SCENT – The long lasting refreshing scent of lime and cocoa butter leaves your pet smelling fresh and ready for cuddles!
SAFE SOLUTION – Soap Free, Paraben Free and Dye Free. Made with naturally derived ingredients and safe when used as directed on dogs and cats 12 weeks or older.
SHED CONTROL – For best results, use with TropiClean Lime & Coconut Shed Control Shampoo.
MADE IN THE USA – We proudly manufacture and ship our products with only the highest quality, naturally derived ingredients.

MADE WITH NATURALLY DERIVED INGREDIENTS – TropiClean defines ingredients to be naturally derived if they are either naturally-occurring raw materials or are adapted from naturally-occurring plant or mineral based raw materials.
Smelly Pet? Freshen up with TropiClean Grooming Products for your Dog or Cat.

TropiClean Pet Products offers a full range of naturally-derived cat and dog products including TropiClean Grooming Products, TropiClean Natural Flea & Tick, SPA by TropiClean, TropiClean OxyMed and Fresh Breath by TropiClean Oral Care and Dental Products.
You Make the Moments. We Make them Fresh.
